body.name: ADORNEVE Night Stand with Charging Station and Sensor Light, Nightstand with Drawers, Bedside Table with LED Light, Side Table for Bedroom,White and Gold
features: 【NIGHTSTAND WITH SENSOR LIGHT】:Under the power on situation,you can turn on or turn off the LED light through close to the induction area with hand.Long Press the induction area,the color brightness can be adjusted. It's very convenient for your reading,evening activities etc.

【NIGHTSTAND WITH BEDSIDE ORGANIZER BAG】:3 pockets are perfect to contain remote control, eye glasses, headphone, pens, and other gadgets. Our bedside organizer storage bag is very sturdy and well made. A great solution for home storage and organization.Also including 3 pcs of hook up design,which make it easy to organize your Jewelry,Glasses,locks,watches etc.

【NIGHTSTAND WITH CHARGING STATION】:2 Standard Plug Outlets & 2 USB Ports port allows you to charge mobile devices such as cell phone, tablet etc.The charging station also includes a on-off switch,which strengthens the security.
【MODERN SIDE END TABLE】:The whole design is modern and fashion.Luxury Style,Add so much charm for your room. Not only can be used at bedroom,also living room or study house.
【EASY TO ASSEMBLE】: All accessories are included and it's easy to assemble with the instruction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very clear step-by-step assembly instructions!
reviews.reviewText: The instructions included for this nightstand are much more clear and simple than, for example, instructions for I_k_e_a furniture. There are numerous steps, but each step involves just one action. To make assembly even easier, unpack everything and check each item off the enclosed list before starting. The number labels had come off two of the pieces, but I figured out what they were during that initial inventory and labeled them with sticky notes. I assembled it mostly by myself, but not completely. There were a few times when I needed an extra pair of hands. The kit had all of the necessary hardware, including extras of most screws and bolts. You'll need a screwdriver and (ideally) a cordless drill with a screwdriver bit. The finish is delicate - bits of it chipped off around a few of the screws, but none of those parts are visible. This is not a solid wood piece that you'll hand down over generations. For what it is, it looks great and is very practical.It was purchased as a gift for an older person who has TONS of stuff around her bedside: medications, tissues, reading glasses, remote controls, water bottles, books, hair brush, and etc. All of those things fit in/on this table. The light is bright, and provides a nice ambient light when dimmed - definitely a plus. She's thrilled about the USB ports for charging her phone and Kindle. It would be a good addition to a kid's room, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Much smaller than I anticipated, seems as if it’s for a child’s bed side, I had to raise it up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Big puzzle , cheap sticker to hold scanner
reviews.reviewText: Very cute ok but sort of difficult getting it together also use screw driver when instructions says so. Drawers are kind of funny don't close all the way, they all do but you have to lift a drawer up to get it all to fit in. The sticker for thr pad for the sensor is very weak. Be sure to have velcro tape instead mucb stronger. The image on the side shows it bigger compared to real life but I appreciate it so far with the controllers smooth material doesn't scratch love the knobs but they aren't snugged fit . Just be prepared for it not meeting your expectations 100 percent. A little too tiny for me but I'll work it out. I love the idea gonna keep it and make it work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: This nightstand is what I had been looking for for two years and I finally found it! It’s a beautiful, quality piece. The assembly process was chill, it looks great in my room, even the cats approve. The only changes I would make would be warm LEDs instead of cool and maybe piggyback the power source for them off the power strip so only one plug was needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It is much smaller than it looks on the pics
reviews.reviewText: I like the style. It is cute but too small, too many pieces, and the charging station only worked for one day. It is a waste of money because it is too much trouble to unassemble to send it back. I should have trust the negative reviews.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective Product that we are expected to pay for return!
reviews.reviewText: Drawers were incorrectly aligned. Holes were lasered in wrong spot for build when put together. Unit looks much smaller in person, although features and design idea was great. Rather than pay shipping, I guess my grandchildren will have misaligned dwarf furniture....buyers beware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, very sturdy. My daughter loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars So many parts
reviews.reviewText: If you’re an engineer or a rocket scientist or someone who’s looking for the feeling of pride, when you complete a task man, this is the one for you I’m pretty sure there were a Bajillion pieces and even as our families designated furniture assembly person for the last 20+ years, I really question the value of this item versus the hours it takes to put together. my daughter seems to like it. It has the cool hand sensor feature for the light and all the chargers but in the end it’s still fake wood and will probably end up looking like crap in a couple years , I hope I’m wrong because that was the worst thing I’ve ever had to put together.
